name: Numerical Computational Tools
tagline: A bunch of numerical tools of immense importance to the world of scientific computing.
body:
# Welcome to my GitHub Project page NUMERICAL COMPUTATIONAL  TOOLS

> "There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.” – Ella Wheeler Wilcox 

### It is my mission to code the most sophisticated mathematical tools to ease scientific computing....

### Authors and Contributors
 G R Krishna Chand Avatar @kcavatar is an Aerospace Engineering sophomore at PEC University of Technology, Chandigarh (India). He is a profound lover of a human being, besides aerodynamics, propulsion,computational programming,finite element analysis and aircraft structures. His blogs on unnecessary topics can be read at [KCAvatar's Blogs](http://kcavatar.in). You could look up his one-page profile at [about.me](https://about.me/kcavatar).
